```{r, message = F}
# Cleaned our data

survey = read.csv("DATA1001_survey.csv")

library(tidyverse)

survey_fresh = survey %>%
                    rename(
                    
                      `Age` = 2,
                      `LGA` = 3,
                      `Opinion on lockdown` = 4,
                      `Rule adherance` = 5,
                      `Cohabitation` = 6,
                      `Income` = 7,
                      `Lockdown time spent outdoors` = 8, 
                      `Lockdown time spent exercising` = 9,
                      `Low mood` = 10,
                      `Happy mood` = 11,
                      `Hours technology` = 12
                       ) 

```

```{r}
str(survey_fresh)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ex = survey_fresh$"Hours technology"
lm = survey_fresh$"Happy mood"

ggplot(survey_fresh, aes(x = lm, y = ex)) +
  geom_point()
```
